plot: Marcos is working a dead end job, dreaming of a shot at a Music Career in Hip Hop. But when Paulito gets Marcos involved with Guns, Money & Gangsters to make his dream reality, Marcos will have to decide how far he is willing to go.
title: Righteous Ways
plot_es: Marcos is working a dead end job, dreaming of a shot at a Music Career in Hip Hop. But when Paulito gets Marcos involved with Guns, Money & Gangsters to make his dream reality, Marcos will have to decide how far he is willing to go.
plot_en: Marcos is working a dead end job, dreaming of a shot at a Music Career in Hip Hop. But when Paulito gets Marcos involved with Guns, Money & Gangsters to make his dream reality, Marcos will have to decide how far he is willing to go.
